cause.description: Pilgrims need cookies. After their arduous trip on the Mayflower, they have always been emaciated, and they really need some food. Besides, 96% of pilgrims have never had a cookie, and that is an enormous shame. Therefore, we need to find pilgrims - only the ones with the buckled hats - and give them cookies.
cause.mission: Find pilgrims and give them cookies.
cause.name: Cookies For Pilgrims
